full_summary:
**Tender Title**: Professional Audit Support Services for the Canada Revenue Agency 
 **Tender Number**: 1000457737

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) seeks professional audit support services to assist in internal control assessments. The services required will enable the agency to provide assurance that departmental operations are properly reported and resources are managed effectively and efficiently, and with integrity.

**Contract Period**: The initial contract period will be for one year from the contract award date. The contract will contain one irrevocable option to extend the contract period by up to two additional years.

**Estimated Effort**: The estimated level of effort for the initial contract period is 465 hours, and 465 hours for each of the first two option periods.

**Delivery Location**: The services will be delivered remotely, with the option to deliver in the National Capital Region (NCR) on request.

**Security Requirements**: The successful bidder must have the necessary security level to access Protected B information, with authorization to access Protected B resources and a reliability status of Protected B.

**Eligibility**: Eligible bidders are Supply Arrangement Holders who are Tier 1 qualified for Stream 3, Information Technology and Systems Audits, in the following categories:

* Partner/Managing Director
* Project Manager/Leader
* Senior Auditor

**Trade Agreements**: This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCoFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPaFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (CUKTCA)

**RFP Documents**: RFP documents will be shared directly with eligible Supply Arrangement Holders via email.

**Contact**: For more information, please contact Marie-Claude Lepage, Contract Officer, at (343) 572-7146 or marie-claude.lepage@cra-arc.gc.ca.
